name: OMNA
description: OMNA for Shopify. Sell Anywhere, Manage On One

scripts.deploy-dev: npm run deploy-d1 && npm run deploy-d2
scripts.deploy-d1: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile cenit-io --delete --exclude '*' --include '*.html' build/ s3://omna-dev
scripts.deploy-d2: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile cenit-io --delete --exclude '*.html' --size-only build/ s3://omna-dev
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run deploy-p1 && npm run deploy-p2
scripts.deploy-p1: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile cenit-io --delete --exclude '*' --include '*.html' build/ s3://omna-ii
scripts.deploy-p2: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile cenit-io --delete --exclude '*.html' --size-only build/ s3://omna-ii
scripts.deploy-back: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile cenit-io --delete build/ --size-only s3://omna-dev && npm run invalidate
